io.scanbot.sdk.barcode_scanner

Class ScanbotBarcodeScannerSDKInitializer

  • io.scanbot.sdk.barcode_scanner.ScanbotBarcodeScannerSDKInitializer

  • public class ScanbotBarcodeScannerSDKInitializer

    Initializes Scanbot SDK library. Use it to set up desired components and then call .initialize. Can be initialized only once.

    See Also:
    .initialize

    • Field Detail

        See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • withLogging

        @NotNull
public ScanbotBarcodeScannerSDKInitializer withLogging(boolean useLog)

        Enables or disables logs in Scanbot Barcode Scanner SDK.

        Logs are printed into LogCat as well as saved on the device. You can find them in Environment.getExternalStorageDirectory/debug_logs/package_name. Usually it is /sdcard/debug_logs/package_name

        By default all logs are disabled. If you're using logging, consider switching it off for production builds for security and performance reasons.

        This method must be called before .initialize, so it is possible to change logging settings before initializing the SDK.

        Parameters:
        useLog - true to enable loggingfalse to disable logging
        Returns:
        same class ScanbotBarcodeScannerSDKInitializer, so calls can be chained
        See Also:
        Environment.getExternalStorageDirectory, package_name, package_name, .initialize

      • useFileEncryption

        @NotNull
public ScanbotBarcodeScannerSDKInitializer useFileEncryption(boolean enableFileEncryption,
                                                                      @Nullable
                                                                      FileIOProcessor fileIOProcessor)

        Sets a global Scanbot Barcode Scanner SDK flag which enables/disables a usage of encrypted file IO processor for all image and pdf files. By default - false.

      • logger

        @NotNull
public ScanbotBarcodeScannerSDKInitializer logger(@NotNull
                                                           Logger logger)

        Adjust this parameter to specify which interface Logger should be used. To set a custom logger ScanbotBarcodeScannerSDKInitializer.withLogging must be set to true

        Parameters:

        Returns:
